p: From this review, we attempted to highlight natural medicines that could be used against SARS-CoV-2. Different companies and institutes have launched vaccines after getting approval from World Health Organization (WHO), whereas some vaccines are still under clinical trials. Different antivirals that have been previously used against SARS, MERS, and influenza have been evaluated alone or in combination, but still, no fruitful response has been achieved. Furthermore, it has been reported that the virus has a high rate of mutation, which is again a hurdle in the development of a vaccine [ 92].
